sourcesContent: import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav-list', templateUrl: './nav-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav-list.component.css'] }) export class NavListComponent { @Input() pag : { offset: number, limit: number, current: number, total: number } = {offset:0,limit:20,current:1,total:0}; public totalPags : number[] = [] @Output() pagination = new EventEmitter() public isNext(bool:boolean) : void { this.pagination.emit(bool); } ngOnInit(){ } }
